Starting the game takes you to the character select screen. 
 
 Select three of the characters and contineu to the battle. Each has unique stats, so pick carfully. 
 
 Deploy units by picking a tile on your half of the board and lock them in with the continue button. 
 
 selects characters to move or attack with them. Use the continue button to move through battle phases: Deployment, Movement, Attack. 
 
 Defeat all enemies before they defeat you to win.
